info.description: This is the API of Alexandria.
info.title: Alexandria API

post.description:
Create a new discussion
If parent ID field is used, the discussion will be a reply

get.description: Get a discussion by discussion ID
get.summary: Get discussion

delete.description: Delete a discussion with given ID from database

get.description:
Gets an array of all the first-level replies of a discussion
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Get all the replies of a discussion

get.description:
Get all reports that have been added to this discussion
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Get all reports of this discussion

post.description: Create a new report for a discussion
post.summary: Add a new report to a discussion

get.description:
Returns all posts that meet the requirements in the form
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Filters all posts

get.description:
Returns all project posts that meet the requirements in the form
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Filters all project posts

put.description: Update the fields of a member

post.description: Create a new member from the given fields

get.description: Get a member by user ID
get.summary: Get member from database

delete.description: Delete a member with given ID from database

get.description:
Get all branches that this member is a collaborator of
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Get all branches of this member

get.description:
Get all branches that this member is a collaborator of
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Get all branches of this member

get.description:
Get all posts that this member is a collaborator of
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Get all posts of this member

get.description:
Get all project posts that this member is a collaborator of
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Get all project posts of this member

get.description:
Get all posts that this member has saved
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Get all saved posts of this member

post.description: Adds a post to the saved posts of a member

get.description:
Get all project posts that this member has saved
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Get all saved project posts of this member

post.description: Adds a project post to the saved project posts of a member

put.description: Update any number of the aspects of a branch

post.description: Create a new question or discussion branch

get.description: Get a branch by branch ID
get.summary: Get branch

delete.description: Delete a branch with given ID from database

get.description:
Returns true if the user fulfills the requirements to review the branch
Returns false if user is unauthorized to review the branch
get.summary: Returns whether the user is allowed to review this branch

get.description: Returns an array of the statuses of all the reviews of this branch
get.summary: Returns status of all branch reviews

post.description: Adds a review to a branch
post.summary: Adds a review to a branch

get.description: Returns a review with the given ID of the branch with the given ID
get.summary: Returns a review of a branch

put.description: Update any number of the aspects of a question or discussion post

post.description: Create a new question or discussion post

Create a new question or discussion post
Creates a post in the same way as CreatePost
However, the post files are imported from the given Github repository
post.summary: Create new post with the version imported from github

get.description: Get a post by post ID
get.summary: Get post

delete.description: Delete a post with given ID from database

get.description:
Get all reports that have been added to this post
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Get all reports of this post

post.description: Create a new report for a post
post.summary: Add a new report to a post

put.description: Update any number of the aspects of a project post

post.description:
Create a new project post
Creates a project post in the same way as CreateProjectPost
However, the post files are imported from the given Github repository
post.summary: Create new project post with the version imported from github

get.description: Get a project post by ID
get.summary: Get project post

delete.description: Delete a project post with given ID from database

get.description:
Returns all discussions on this project post and all of it's branches
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Returns all discussions associated with the project post

get.description:
Get all closed branches associated with the given project post
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Get all closed branches of a project post

get.description:
Get all open branches associated with the given project post
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Get all open branches of a project post

get.description: Returns all scientific tags in the database
get.summary: Returns all scientific tags

get.description: Get the entire zipped repository of a version
get.summary: Get the repository of a version

post.description: Create a new version with discussions and repository

get.description: Get a version by version ID
get.summary: Get version

get.description:
Returns all discussions on this version that are not a reply to another discussion
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Returns all level 1 discussions associated with the version

get.description: Get the contents of a single file from a repository of a version
get.summary: Get a file from a repository

get.description: Get the render of the repository underlying a version
get.summary: Get the render of a version

get.description: Get the file tree of a repository of a version
get.summary: Get the file tree of a repository

making the password just a string for now
